core

Class TimeReached

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.UserAction
      • core.TimeReached

  • public class TimeReached
extends UserAction
    Checks if the given time is reached (when updated by TimeChecker). Can be created by behaviors using UserActionFactory.
    Author:
    csiki

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Time time
      Time (including year, month, day, hour, minute).
      private core.TimeChecker timeChecker
      TimeChecker instance.
      private boolean timeReached
      True if the given time is reached, false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • isTimeReached

        public boolean isTimeReached()
        Gets if the given time is reached (after activated only).
        Returns:
        True if has been activated and time is reached, false otherwise.

      • getYear

        public int getYear()
        Gets the given year.
        Returns:

        Returns:

        Returns:

        public void nextMinutes(int min)
        Sets the time to the current + min minutes.
        Parameters:
        min -

      • update

        public void update()
        TimeChecker calls it every minute. Behavior should NOT call it!
        Specified by:
        update in class UserAction

      • activate

        public void activate(Behavior behavior)
        Activates TimeReached, so it listens for TimeChecker. Should be activated after created by behavior!
        Specified by:
        activate in class UserAction

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()
        Deactivates TimeReached, so it won't listen for key hits. Can be called by behavior but automatically called by itself if the expected key is hit (after had been activated ofc.).
        Specified by:
        deactivate in class UserAction
